page.title: 02A Day In The Life Of ......
page.content: On Wednesday my dad would wake me up at 7.30a.m. I would get dressed quickly and go down stairs for breakfast and I would say "Hello Jess" I have a bowl full of Shredded Wheat which is made from Bran,then I have 2 slices of toast. Then I go up stairs to go and clean my teeth in the bathroom.Teeth are white things in your mouth and you use them to chew with.Then I go down stairs to do my piano practice. Then I would put on my coat and set out for school.A school is a box with rooms in for each class.In the afternoon Tina and I go to Bodmin, which is the town we have our Guitar lessons.At 3.50p.m. we come home I watch the telly which is a box which you turn on and off,and a picture comes on .I have my tea at 5.30a.m. tea is like breakfast and at 10.30a.m. I go to bed.
